name: fittrackee
tagline: A self-hosted sports tracker for activities, maps, and training statistics
description: FitTrackee is an open-source sports tracker with a privacy-first approach. It supports GPX files, map views, stats, and calorie tracking for running, cycling, and hiking. Everything runs locally on your own server.

features.title: Activity Tracking
features.description: Record running, cycling, and other sport activities

features.title: GPS Data Support
features.description: Import and display GPS tracks for recorded activities

features.title: Statistics and Summaries
features.description: View distance, duration, and pace statistics over time

features.title: Activity History
features.description: Browse past activities with detailed views

features.title: User Accounts
features.description: Manage activities using individual user profiles

features.title: Data Import and Export
features.description: Import activities from files and export stored data

features.title: Web-Based Interface
features.description: Access activity data through a browser interface
